entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's best friends. He points his wand at the low ceiling and opens a hatch to reveal a ladder leading down to their feet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and Ron's best friend. He has never met a ghoul before and is surprised by its appearance.

entities.name: ghoul
entities.description: A creature that sometimes disrupts the nightly silence at Hogwarts. It is described as horrible, half-sucking, half-moaning, with an unpleasant smell like open drains.

relationships.description: Ron points his wand at the low ceiling and opens a hatch to reveal a ladder leading down to their feet, where they find the ghoul.
Harry follows Ron up the ladder and sees the ghoul curled up in the room, fast asleep with its large mouth wide open.
